short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QR Code Generator & Scanner is a very simple and useful application which helps you to create your own custom Bar-code image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Code Generator & Scanner is a robust and user-friendly application designed to simplify the creation and scanning of QR codes. This versatile tool offers a comprehensive range of options for generating custom QR codes, making it an essential utility for both personal and professional use. Here’s a detailed overview of its features:

Key Features:
Text:

Encode any textual information into a QR code.
Ideal for sharing quotes, instructions, or any text-based content.
Simply input your text, and the app will generate a corresponding QR code.
URL:

Convert web addresses into QR codes for easy sharing.
Perfect for promoting websites, blog posts, or any online content.
Just enter the URL, and a QR code will be created for instant access.
SMS:

Create QR codes that, when scanned, open the default SMS app with a pre-defined message.
Useful for marketing campaigns or quick message sharing.
Specify the recipient’s number and message text to generate the QR code.
Email:

Generate QR codes to compose emails with preset addresses and subjects.
Facilitates quick email sharing and promotional communication.
Input the recipient’s email address and subject line to create the code.
Call:

Make phone calls directly by scanning a QR code.
Efficient for business cards or contact information sharing.
Enter the phone number, and the app generates a QR code for quick dialing.
Location:

Share geographical coordinates through a QR code.
Ideal for event locations, meeting points, or any place-based information.
Input the latitude and longitude to create the QR code.
WiFi:

Connect to WiFi networks by scanning a QR code.
Convenient for guests to connect to your network without typing passwords.
Provide the network SSID, encryption type, and password to generate the code.
Contact:

Save contact information quickly and easily.
Suitable for digital business cards or personal contact sharing.
Enter the contact details like name, phone number, email, etc., to create a vCard QR code.
Application Benefits:
Ease of Use: Intuitive interface that allows anyone to create QR codes without technical expertise.
Versatility: Supports a wide range of data types, making it suitable for various applications.
Convenience: Eliminates the need for manually entering information by scanning QR codes.
Efficiency: Enhances data sharing and connectivity, saving time and effort.
QR Code Generator & Scanner is the perfect tool for creating customized QR codes, whether for personal use, marketing purposes, or professional applications. It ensures seamless and quick information sharing, enhancing your productivity and connectivity.
